document_data.mainbody:
ord Terxa was a Shadovar advisor that served the Most High Telamont Tanthul circa the late 14 century DR.
He enjoyed the benefit of having the Most Highs ear, and his perspective was as trusted as his contemporary Hadrhune.
In Mirtul of the , Lord Terxa convinced High Prince Telamont Tanthul to inform their shadow adept agent Galaeron Nihmedu about Shadovar provocation of the phaerimm beneath Myth Drannor, and that the creatures planned to strike back at Thultanthars mythallar.
